Title: AN ACT TO AMEND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED THREE HUNDRED AND THIRTY, ENTITLED "AN ACT APPROPRIATING NINETY-SIX MILLION THREE HUNDRED FIFTY-ONE THOUSAND AND THREE HUNDRED PESOS FOR PUBLIC WORKS."
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 610, August 29, 1940 ]
AN ACT TO AMEND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED THREE HUNDRED AND THIRTY, ENTITLED "AN ACT APPROPRIATING NINETY-SIX MILLION THREE HUNDRED FIFTY-ONE THOUSAND AND THREE HUNDRED PESOS FOR PUBLIC WORKS."
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. The following items of appropriation under section one, subsection C, paragraph (r), of Commonwealth Act Numbered Three hundred and thirty are amended so as to read as follows:
"ANTIQUE


"10. For the road to barrio Martinez, Tibiao
P 155.73



"10a. For the Culasi-Camancihan barrio road, Culasi
3,844.27



"CAGAYAN


"29. For the Agugaddan barrio school, Pefiablanca
500.00



"MANILA



"17. For the construction of a public bath and toilet at the corner of Ariston Bautista and Itaguyod and Kalahi streets, Punta, Sta. Ana
8,500.00



"34. For the construction of a public bath and toilet between Ariston Bautista and F. Roxas streets, Punta, Sta. Ana
8,500.00



Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.ℒαwρhi৷
Approved, August 29, 1940, with the exception of the following items: Section 1: Antique, items 10 and 10a; Manila, items 17 and 34.
